com.compendium
Class SystemProperties

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.SystemProperties

public class SystemProperties
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to load and store the system initialisation variables.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Field Detail

system

private static java.util.Properties system
The properties class holding the system initialisation properties.

applicationName

public static java.lang.String applicationName
The Application Name to Display

applicationNameAddition

public static java.lang.String applicationNameAddition
The Text to place after the application name to qualify a version or flavour of the application

startUpTitle

public static java.lang.String startUpTitle
Splash dialog title when Compendium starts. Can tailor this to specify a version like 'Starting Compendium - OpenLearn' or 'Starting CompendiumLD'

startUpQualifyingText

public static java.lang.String startUpQualifyingText
Text which appears under the title on the start up screen. Should be a short sentence.

createDefaultProject

public static boolean createDefaultProject
When Compendium first run, should it create a first default project? see also 'defaultProjectName'

defaultProjectName

public static java.lang.String defaultProjectName
If you are letting Compendium auto-create the first default project, this is the name that project will be given. see also 'createDefaultProject'

projectDefaultDataFile

public static java.lang.String projectDefaultDataFile
Specify the XML file to use to load the deafult data for a project. You can choose to leave this blank if you want no default data at all. This file must either be a Compendium xml export file or a Comendium XML zip export file - (DefaultData.zip)

defaultMapBackgroundImage

public static java.lang.String defaultMapBackgroundImage
Specify a default background image to be used on all maps Useful when company water marks etc are required.

defaultHomeViewBackgroundImage

public static java.lang.String defaultHomeViewBackgroundImage
Specify a default background image to be used on all home views Useful when company water marks etc are required.

defaultStencilSetName

public static java.lang.String defaultStencilSetName
If this is set it will open this stencil set by default. Note: the name below must match a stencil set name exactly for it to open it.

bannerImage

public static java.lang.String bannerImage
The banner image file for image that sits under the menu bar when the Compendium application is running. File should be placed in System/ini/images folder. The default image is 4500w x 18h. It will be loaded 0x,0y under the Menubar.

splashImage

public static java.lang.String splashImage
The startup/about dialog splash background image file. File should be placed in System/ini/images folder. The image is loaded at 0x,0y. It's default/max size is 300w x 400h.

aboutButtonImage

public static java.lang.String aboutButtonImage
If this image is specified it is position in the about dialog's top-lefthand corner at 10x, 10y. File should be placed in System/ini/images folder. This button will launch the companyWebsiteURL specified below. So the button image should be associated with that url (like tha Company/product logo)

companyWebsiteURL

public static java.lang.String companyWebsiteURL
This url is used on the About dialog. It is launch through the aboutButtonImage specified above. It is indeded to be the Company/Product url (hence the name), but can be anything you like.

defaultPowerExportPath

public static java.lang.String defaultPowerExportPath
The path that a Power Export should go into by default. This was made editable as the Open Learn version had a subfolder in Exports for these specific exports. The default is just the main 'Exports' folder. If left blank, that is where the Power Export will go to.

releaseNotesURL

public static java.lang.String releaseNotesURL
This is the link on the Help menu for the release notes for the current version of Compendium.

quickStartMovie

public static java.lang.String quickStartMovie
This is the link on the Help menu for the Quick start Movie.

helpAndSupportURL

public static java.lang.String helpAndSupportURL
This is the url for the About dialog which will be accessed by the 'Help And Support' button on that dialog.

simpleInterface

public static boolean simpleInterface
The interface mode to start Compendium with when first installed. 'true' = simplified interface; 'false' = full interface. The user can override this and their choice is stored in Format.properties

showAdminDatabase

public static boolean showAdminDatabase
Should the admin database name be displayed in the startup screen? 'true' = yes; 'false' = no.

welcomeBackgroundImage

public static java.lang.String welcomeBackgroundImage
This is the option to set the background image used on the welcome page. The default one supplied is 3000 x 3000, to allow for large screens across to monitors. The file should be placed in System/ini/images folder. Compendium default for this options is: System/ini/images/background.png

welcomeMessage

public static java.lang.String welcomeMessage
This is the option to specify the Welcome page title message. If you want the Compendium application version included in the message add where you want it to appear. Compendium default for this options is: Welcome to Compendium

welcomeNewProjectButtonImage

public static java.lang.String welcomeNewProjectButtonImage
This is the option to specify the button image to use for the button to open the New Project Dialog. The file should be placed in System/ini/images folder. Compendium default for this options is: System/ini/images/new-project.png

welcomeButton1Image

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton1Image
This is the option to specify the button image for the 1st user defined button. The file should be placed in System/ini/images folder. When pressed it will activate the path/url specified by welcomeButton1Link. Compendium default for this options is: System/ini/images/pdf.png

welcomeButton1Link

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton1Link
This is the option to specify the link activated by welcomeButton1Image. This can be a url (please specify fully) or a local file. If the link is the path to a local file, the path must be specified relative to the Compendium folder. for example System/resources/Help/Docs/CompendiumQuickRef.pdf Compendium default for this options is: System/resources/Help/Docs/CompendiumQuickRef.pdf

welcomeButton1Hint

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton1Hint
This is the option to specify the button rollover hint to tell the user what button 1 is for.

welcomeButton2Image

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton2Image
This is the option to specify the button image for the 2nd user defined button. The file should be placed in System/ini/images folder. When pressed it will activate the path/url specified by welcomeButton2Link. Compendium default for this options is: System/ini/images/movie.png

welcomeButton2Link

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton2Link
This is the option to specify the link activated by welcomeButton2Image. This can be a url (please specify fully) or a local file. If the link is the path to a local file, the path must be specified relative to the Compendium folder. for example System/resources/Help/Docs/CompendiumQuickRef.pdf Compendium default for this options is: System/resources/Help/Movies/welcome.html

welcomeButton2Hint

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton2Hint
This is the option to specify the button rollover hint to tell the user what button 2 is for.

welcomeButton3Image

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton3Image
This is the option to specify the button image for the 3rd user defined button. The file should be placed in System/ini/images folder When pressed it will activate the path/url specified by welcomeButton3Link. Compendium default for this options is: System/ini/images/help.png

welcomeButton3Link

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton3Link
This is the option to specify the link activated by welcomeButton3Image. This can be a url (please specify fully) or a local file. If the link is the path to a local file, the path must be specified relative to the Compendium folder. for example System/resources/Help/Docs/CompendiumQuickRef.pdf Compendium default for this options is: http://www.compendiuminstitute.org/training/videos/

welcomeButton3Hint

public static java.lang.String welcomeButton3Hint
This is the option to specify the button rollover hint to tell the user what button 3 is for.

welcomeEnterButtonImage

public static java.lang.String welcomeEnterButtonImage
This is the option to specify the button image to use for the button to close the Welcome page. The file should be placed in System/ini/images folder. Compendium default for this options is: System/ini/images/enter.png

Constructor Detail

SystemProperties

public SystemProperties()
Constructor. Does nothing.

Method Detail

loadProperties

public static void loadProperties()
Load the format properties into the class variables.

loadSystemIni

public static void loadSystemIni()
Load the format properties for the appropriate file.

getProperty

public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
Return the value against the given key if found, else an empty String.

Parameters:
key, - the key to set.
Returns:
String, the associated value.
